Osmaniye et al. synthesised benzothiazole-thiazolidine derivatives and studied their anticancer activities against C6 and healthy NIH3T3 cell lines. Among the synthesised derivatives, substituted phenylthizolidene based benzothiazole 70 and substituted nitrophenylthizolidene benzothiazole 71 ( Figure 42) exhibited some cytotoxic activities against C6 cell line showing IC 50 value 0.03 mM. The SAR studies showed that the presence of a phenyl group on the thiazolidine part of the structure increased the selectivity while substitution with an electron withdrawing or donating groups decreased the selectivity
